mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_ID, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_SECRET_TYPE, BOARD_STATUS, DEPARTMENT_NAME, TO_CHAR(QUESTION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS QUESTION_DATE FROM V_BOARD_QA ORDER BY BOARD_ID DESC

SELECT BOARD_ID, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_SECRET_TYPE, QUESTION_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(QUESTION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS QUESTION_DATE, PATIENT_NAME, BOARD_STATUS, DEPARTMENT_NAME, ANSWER_NO, ANSWER_CONTENT, STAFF_NAME, TO_CHAR(ANSWER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ANSWER_DATE FROM V_BOARD_QA WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_ID, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_PRIORITY, BOARD_STATUS, MEMBER_NO, DEPARTMENT_NO, BOARD_SECRET_TYPE, BOARD_DELETE_TYPE ) VALUES ( BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{boardType}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, SYSDATE, 1, '대기중', #{memberNo}, 1, #{boardSecretType}, 'F' )
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO as boardNo, BOARD_TITLE as boardTitle, BOARD_CONTENT as boardContent, WRITER_ID as writerId, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as createDate, STATUS as status FROM INQUIRY_BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
